entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -31.0°C

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -34.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 36 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 36 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:50 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
